name: Domino VR
description: Domino VR is a new and simple VR game for the HTC Vive designed to let you experience that "nooooo, they're falling!" feeling all over again. You can build whatever you want in a fun sandbox environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 /Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
